entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
